title: SkewDB
summary:
Welcome to SkewDB! A free database of GC and many other skews for over 53,000 chromosomes and plasmids (viewer, blog post).
The Scientific Spring Meeting KNVM & NVMM 2022 presentation is here (pdf). And now also on YouTube as video!
SkewDB, a comprehensive database of GC and 10 other skews for over 30,000 chromosomes and plasmids, Nature Scientific Data, 2022 doi:10.5061/dryad.g4f4qrfr6 Last database update: 5th of July 2024, now featuring homopolymer counts & codon bias data!
